name: B. Vlad and Cafes
statement:
Vlad likes to eat in cafes very much. During his life, he has visited
cafes times. Unfortunately, Vlad started to feel that his last visits
are not any different from each other. To fix that Vlad had a small
research.First of all, Vlad assigned individual indices to all cafes.
Then, he wrote down indices of cafes he visited in a row, in order of
visiting them. Now, Vlad wants to find such a cafe that his last visit
to that cafe was before his last visits to every other cafe. In other
words, he wants to find such a cafe that he hasnâ€™t been there for as
long as possible. Help Vlad to find that cafe.
